home
A tool to manage classpaths and clojure namespaces on a persistent JVM

Other jark clients

Emacs

We are working on a slime-nrepl client . It is still in very early development.
But for now, one can start a swank instance and connect from emacs.
To start the swank server do client> jark swank start [--port].
To connect from emacs: M-x slime-connect 127.0.0.1 [4005]

When writing clojure scripts using jark, add the following to .emacs to recognise it as clojure-mode.

(add-to-list 'interpreter-mode-alist '("jark" . clojure-mode))

Vim

Hope someone writes a nrepl-client for vim!

Android client

Coming soon in 0.4 release.
